name: app.R
content:
library(shiny)
library(shinyjs)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(reactable)

# Load data (adjust path as needed)
tracks <- read_excel(here::here("data/ultimate-MKW-randomizer-spreadsheet.xlsx")) %>%
  select(Track, Type, Rating) %>%
  mutate(
    Track = as.character(Track),
    Type = as.factor(Type),
    Rating = as.factor(Rating)
  )

ui <- page_sidebar(
  tags$head(
    tags$link(rel = "stylesheet", href = "style.css"),
    tags$script(src = "custom.js"),
    useShinyjs()
  ),
  title = "Track Randomizer",
  sidebar = sidebar(
    id = "main-sidebar",
    tags$h2(class = "sidebar-title", "Parameters"),
    position = "left",
    selectInput("theme_selector", "Theme",
                choices = c(
                  "Mint" = "mint",
                  "Forest" = "forest",
                  "Ocean" = "ocean",
                  "Sunset" = "sunset",
                  "Lavender" = "lavender",
                  "Citrus" = "citrus",
                  "Coral" = "coral",
                  "Berry" = "berry",
                  "Spring" = "spring",
                  "Sky" = "sky"
                ),
                selected = "mint"
    ),
    numericInput("n_tracks", "Number of tracks to pick", value = 8, min = 1, max = nrow(tracks)),
    numericInput("pct_Splus", "S+ %", value = 58, min = 0, max = 100, step = 0.1),
    numericInput("pct_S", "S %", value = 16.5, min = 0, max = 100, step = 0.1),
    numericInput("pct_A", "A %", value = 15, min = 0, max = 100, step = 0.1),
    numericInput("pct_B", "B %", value = 9, min = 0, max = 100, step = 0.1),
    numericInput("pct_C", "C %", value = 1, min = 0, max = 100, step = 0.1),
    numericInput("pct_D", "D %", value = 0.5, min = 0, max = 100, step = 0.1),
    # Percentage sum display
    textOutput("pct_sum_text"),
    actionButton("randomize", "Randomize Tracks", class = "btn-primary")
  ),
  fluidPage(
    h3("Picked Tracks"),
    reactableOutput("picked_table"),
    tags$hr(),
    h3("All Tracks"),
    reactableOutput("all_tracks"),
    tags$br(),
    "* Inspired by the ggplate app and packages: shiny, readxl, bslib, reactable"
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  # Theme switching
  observe({
    theme <- input$theme_selector
    js <- sprintf("document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', '%s');", theme)
    shinyjs::runjs(js)
  })
  
  # Show all tracks table
  output$all_tracks <- renderReactable({
    reactable(tracks)
  })
  
  # Percentage sum text
  output$pct_sum_text <- renderText({
    pct_sum <- sum(
      input$pct_Splus,
      input$pct_S,
      input$pct_A,
      input$pct_B,
      input$pct_C,
      input$pct_D
    )
    msg <- sprintf("Total percentage: %.1f%%", pct_sum)
    if (abs(pct_sum - 100) < 1e-3) {
      paste(msg, "✔️")
    } else {
      paste(msg, "❌ (does not add up to 100%)")
    }
  })
  
  # Reactive randomizer
  picked_tracks <- eventReactive(input$randomize, {
    # Build percentage lookup from UI
    pct_lookup <- c(
      "S+" = input$pct_Splus,
      "S"  = input$pct_S,
      "A"  = input$pct_A,
      "B"  = input$pct_B,
      "C"  = input$pct_C,
      "D"  = input$pct_D
    )
    
    # Assign probabilities to each row
    tracks$pct <- pct_lookup[as.character(tracks$Rating)]
    valid_tracks <- tracks[!is.na(tracks$pct) & tracks$pct > 0, ]
    
    # Error handling if not enough valid tracks
    if (nrow(valid_tracks) < input$n_tracks) {
      showNotification("Not enough valid tracks for the chosen n and probabilities.", type = "error")
      return(NULL)
    }
    
    # Weighted sampling
    sample_indices <- sample(nrow(valid_tracks), input$n_tracks, replace = FALSE, prob = valid_tracks$pct)
    valid_tracks[sample_indices, c("Track", "Type", "Rating")]
  })
  
  output$picked_table <- renderReactable({
    req(picked_tracks())
    reactable(picked_tracks())
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

# to publish on github:
# install.packages("shinylive") (if not done yet)
# shinylive::export(appdir = ".", destdir = "docs", resources = c("data", "www"))
# git -b checkout gh-pages (use this when you have not created a gh-pages branch)
# git checkout gh-pages (otherwise use this)
# mv docs/* .
# git add . (or git add --all)
# git commit -m "commit message"
# git push origin gh-pages

name: Scripts/MKW-Randomizer.Rmd
content:
Loading Libraries etcccc

```{r}
library(tidyverse) # general packages with lots of functions
library(here) # for file paths with the project as root
library(reactable) # for interactive tables
```

```{r}
# Loading the data
tracks <- read_excel(here::here("data/ultimate-MKW-randomizer-spreadsheet.xlsx"))
# Selecting the relevant columns
tracks <- tracks %>% select(Track, Type, Rating)
# Making an interactive table
reactable::reactable(tracks)
# Changing the column types
tracks <- tracks %>%
  mutate(
    Track = as.character(Track), # convert Track to character
    Type = as.factor(Type),       # convert Type to factor
    Rating = as.factor(Rating)   # convert Rating to factor
  )
# checking the types
#str(tracks)
```

```{r}
# Define your percentage lookup table for each rating tier
pct_lookup <- c("S+" = 58, "S" = 16.5, "A" = 15, "B" = 9, "C" = 1, "D" = 0.5)

# Function to pick tracks based on weighted probabilities
pick_tracks <- function(tracks, pct_lookup, n = 1) {
  tracks$pct <- pct_lookup[as.character(tracks$Rating)]
  if (any(is.na(tracks$pct))) {
    warning("Some ratings are missing from pct_lookup.")
  }
  sample_indices <- sample(nrow(tracks), n, replace = FALSE, prob = tracks$pct)
  tracks[sample_indices, ]
}
```

#############################################################
#                   R A N D O M I Z E R                     #
#############################################################

```{r}
# Example usage: pick 5 tracks
picked_tracks <- pick_tracks(tracks, pct_lookup, n = 8)
print(picked_tracks)
```
